text: Zheng Jun (born 6 November 1967) is Chinese rock singer-songwriter. He was born in Xi'an. He attended Hangzhou Institute of Electrical Engineering (renamed Hangzhou Dianzi University). His first album, Naked (赤裸裸), was released by Red Star Productions in 1994. He then released Third Eye three years later, and Bloom two years after that. == References == Category:1967 births Category:Chinese singer-songwriters Category:Rock singers Category:Living people Category:20th-century Chinese writers Category:21st- century Chinese writers
title: Zheng Jun
